programme.title: San Francisco: Detroit of the Pacific?
programme.short_synopsis: The crime, gang problems and skyscrapers spoiling San Francisco, and Patty Hearst.
programme.medium_synopsis: The skyscrapers that shattered the myth of San Francisco as a special city; and why it's important to understand the Stockholm syndrome in the Patty Hearst kidnap case.
